verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: Ethically] [V: challenged] and embattled EPA administrator Scott Pruitt has so far survived an incredible number of ethics scandals , apparently trading on his friendship with President Trump , but now close friend Sen. James Inhofe is getting fed up .
